site.title: The German Vaccine Autobahn
site.subtitle: Looking at how fast we're currently vaccinating and making some semi-wild assumptions about when we might reach our destination...

destination.population-first-fully-vaccinated: All vaccine-ready adults will have first dose
destination.population-first-half-vaccinated: Half of vaccine-ready adults will have first dose

footer.assumptions-vaccination-speed: Doses given are assumed to progress linearly at the current speed, and a perfect assignment of first and second-doses is assumed. Predicted delivery quantities and dates from the EU are not used.
footer.byline:
Dashboard assembled by Mark Nightingale.
This is a side project: No liability for correct or incorrect data or calculations is assumed.
